net.ulrice.databinding.viewadapter.impl
Class BorderStateMarker

java.lang.Object
  net.ulrice.databinding.viewadapter.impl.BorderStateMarker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, javax.swing.border.Border, IFStateMarker
public class BorderStateMarker
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.border.Border, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, IFStateMarker

Implementation of the state marker interface. Draws the border and an image depending on the current state of the data in the attribute model.

Author:
christof
